name: Hoptopia
description:
This is a cute mobile casual version of peg-solitaire. 
Designed for portait mode phones, but it is playable in the browser as well.

Just click on the rabbit you want to move and make valid move (Skip another rabbit).
Earn stars by having 3 or less remaining rabbits, when you run out of valid moves.
Use stars to unlock more stages.

2 rabbits left = 1 star

1 rabbit left = 2 stars

Challenge solved = 3 stars
